Posts.Content: mary_posa wrote: I have stage IV cancer with metastasis in the lungs, brain and bones. My Oncologist told me that my treatment options are pretty much nonexistent after 6 years of trying several chemo and adyuvant therapies. I am currently participating in the medical trial Theresa testing TDM 1. I would like to find out if anybody else is taking TDM 1. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: TDM 1 mary_posa Ready2Win

Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2012 09:03PM mary_posa wrote: WOW! I feel motivated to continue fighting. I am usually very positive about my prognosis, but being in a medical trial feels more uncertain. Thank you :)
Posts.Title: TDM 1 mary_posa Ready2Win

Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2012 10:55PM mary_posa wrote: Hello there, I took the tykerb-xeloda combo for about 1.5 years keeping the mets in my lungs, brain and bone at bay until it stopped working 2 months ago. Because I have taken so many different chemo, radiation, and hormonal treatments, my only option left was a medical trial. Currently taken TDM 1 under the medical trial Theresa. Too soon to know if is going to work. My prayers with you.
Posts.Title: Need new thoughts...what chemo now? lovehertons lovehertons

Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2012 10:45PM mary_posa wrote: It is normal for you to be scared, but my advice would be to be positive and use all your energy to get stronger. If the met in your lung is confirmed, I would like to give you hope. I have lived a somewhat normal life for the last 3 years with several mets in both my lungs, plus brain and bone mets. Yes, shortness of breath and bone pain have slowed my down, but I still enjoy quality of life. A prayer for you.
Posts.Title: 5cm mass in lung!!! NOOO tammie Tweety2358
